DOC.brief_summary: Healthy individual ( n=18 ) participate 2 controlled-feeding study period 3 week length : 1 ) Control diet 2 ) Brassica diet . The control diet consist typical American food free Brassica vegetable free glucosinolates isothiocyanate . The Brassica diet contain control diet plus glucosinolate/isothiocyanate treatment food . There break 3 week study period . Blood , urine , fecal sample collect end study period . Eligible participant select base genotype glutathione S-transferase ( GST ) , show influence potential protective role dietary Brassicas . Half participant ( n=9 ) GSTM1-positive individual half ( n=9 ) GSTM1-null genotype .
DOC.criteria: Between 21 70 year age Not currently take glucosinolate/ITC contain supplement Voluntarily agree participate sign inform consent document Free cancer ( never diagnose cancerfree least 5 ) Pregnant , lactating , intend become pregnant study period Known allergy intolerance Brassica vegetables History bariatric surgery nutrient malabsorption disease ( celiac disease ) metabolic disorder require special diet recommendation Use tobacco product Use certain medication ( prescription overthecounter ) may interfere study objective Type 2 diabetes require use diabetes pill , insulin , noninsulin shot Use bloodthinning medication Coumadin ( warfarin ) , Dicumarol , Miradon ( anisindione ) Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
